existing_features.title: Remove the numeric live user count from the LIVE tag displayed on lobby chatroom cards, so the badge text shows only "LIVE" while keeping the pulsing dot indicator.
In the lobby only, change the LIVE tag styling so its top and bottom padding is exactly 0.125rem (Tailwind: py-0.5), without changing its left/right padding.
Remove the numeric live user count from the LIVE tag displayed in the chatroom page header, so the badge text shows only "LIVE" while keeping the pulsing dot indicator.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update LIVE tag UI: remove the live user count from the LIVE tag in both lobby and chatroom pages; in lobby set LIVE tag top/bottom padding to 0.125rem

projectName: Update LIVE tag: remove user count text and adjust lobby padding
